hero.title: Messaging that works where internet doesn’t
hero.description: TuChati is built for communities with limited or patchy connectivity.
hero.saving: smaller data use vs. images-first apps*
hero.note: *Optimized requests and deferred media keep usage low.

remote.title: Built for remote areas
remote.desc: Most apps assume stable 4G/5G. TuChati doesn’t.
remote.item1: Messages queue offline and send when signal returns
remote.item2: Typing, delivery & read states optimized for low overhead
remote.item3: Media sending is optional and bandwidth-aware

org.title: Simple for organizations
org.desc: Coordinate field teams, health workers, and classrooms easily.
